Description: Papyrus; Hieratic literary text recto: The Teaching of Ptahhotep.
Curator's comments: Edition: Caminos, Literary Fragments in the Hieratic Script (1956), pp.52-3, pl. 28-30. Z. Zaba, Les maximes de Ptahhotep (1956), L2 The text of this poem is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/). Translation of text: R. B. Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and Other Egyptian Poems (1999), pp. 246-72; Rde 6: 32 On archive see e.g. Parkinson, Poetry and Culture (2002), pp. 311 Being re-studied by Fedrik Hagen (Cambridge) and Alice Heyne (Basel)
See F. Hagen, An Ancient Egyptian Literary Text in Context; The Instruction of Ptahhotep (OLA 218; Leuven; Peeters), 2012, 179-82.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381152) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381152)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, fractured, insect attack, bloom Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B
